description: Csi.exe is a signed binary from Microsoft that comes with Visual Studio and provides C# interactive capabilities. It can be used to run C# code from a file passed as a parameter in command line. Early version of this utility provided with Microsoft “Roslyn” Community Technology Preview was named 'rcsi.exe' Author: Konstantin Grishchenko, oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Suspicious Csi.exe Usage
query: ((process.executable:*\\csi.exe OR process.executable:*\\rcsi.exe OR winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"csi.exe" OR winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"rcsi.exe") AND Company:"Microsoft\ Corporation")
